        The response is either a SuccessResponse or an ErrorResponse.
        Note that to provision the accessInfoPattern element, the
        captureAccessInfoInPaniHeader system parameter needs to be set to "true".

name: GroupSessionAdmissionControlModifyRequest
documentation:
Request to modify session admission control capacity for the group.
        The response is either a SuccessResponse or an ErrorResponse.

name: GroupShInterfaceGetUserListRequest21sp1
documentation:
Returns a list of all Public User Identities and associated data in a group.
        The response is either a GroupShInterfaceGetUserListResponse21sp1 or an ErrorResponse.

name: GroupStirShakenGetRequest
documentation:
Get Group Stir Shaken service settings.
        The response is either GroupStirShakenGetResponse or ErrorResponse.

name: GroupStirShakenModifyRequest
documentation: Modify Group Stir Shaken service settings.

name: GroupTemplateOnlyDeviceFileGetListRequest
documentation:
Request to get the list of template files used to support a VDM device defined at group level.
        The response is either GroupTemplateOnlyDeviceFileGetListResponse or ErrorResponse.

name: GroupThirdPartyEmergencyCallingGetRequest
documentation:
Get the third-party emergency call service settings for the Group.
        The response is either a GroupThirdPartyEmergencyCallingGetResponse or an ErrorResponse.

name: GroupThirdPartyEmergencyCallingModifyRequest
documentation:
Modify the third-party emergency call service settings for the Group.
        The response is either a SuccessResponse or an ErrorResponse.

name: GroupTrunkGroupGetAvailableDetailListRequest
documentation:
Requests the list of available trunk groups within a group.
        The response is either GroupTrunkGroupGetAvailableDetailListResponse or
        ErrorResponse.

name: GroupTrunkGroupStirShakenGetRequest
documentation:
Get Group Trunk Group Stir Shaken service settings.
        The response is either GroupTrunkGroupStirShakenGetResponse or ErrorResponse.

name: GroupTrunkGroupStirShakenModifyRequest
documentation: Modify group trunk group Stir Shaken service settings.

name: GroupUserCallForwardingSettingsGetListRequest
documentation:
Get a list of users and the service settings for a Call Forwarding service.
        The response is either GroupUserCallForwardingSettingsGetListResponse or ErrorResponse.
        By default, virtual users and non-virtual users that match the selected search criteria are included in the response when "includeVirtualUsers" is present; otherwise, if "includeVirtualUsers" is absent, then only non-virtual users are returned.
        The search can be performed using multiple criteria. If search criteria is specified, only the users matching all of the specified search criteria are included in the response. If no search criteria is specified, all results are returned.

name: GroupUserCallingPlanSettingsGetListRequest
documentation:
Get a list of users and the default or custom calling plan setting.
        The response is either GroupUserCallingPlanSettingsGetListResponse or ErrorResponse.
        By default, virtual users and non-virtual users that match the selected search criteria are included in the response when "includeVirtualUsers" is present; otherwise, if "includeVirtualUsers" is absent, then only non-virtual users are returned.
        The search can be performed using multiple criteria. If search criteria is specified, only the users matching all of the specified search criteria are included in the response. If no search criteria is specified, all results are returned.

name: GroupUserCallWaitingSettingsGetListRequest
documentation:
Get a list of users and the Call Waiting service status (active or not active).
        The response is either GroupUserCallWaitingSettingsGetListResponse or ErrorResponse.
        By default, virtual users and non-virtual users that match the selected search criteria are included in the response when "includeVirtualUsers" is present; otherwise, if "includeVirtualUsers" is absent, then only non-virtual users are returned.
        The search can be performed using multiple criteria. If search criteria is specified, only the users matching all of the specified search criteria are included in the response. If no search criteria is specified, all results are returned.

name: GroupUserHotelingGuestSettingsGetListRequest
documentation:
Get a list of users and their Hoteling Guest service status (active or not active).
        The response is either GroupUserHotelingGuestSettingsGetListResponse or ErrorResponse.
        By default, virtual users and non-virtual users that match the selected search criteria are included in the response when "includeVirtualUsers" is present; otherwise, if "includeVirtualUsers" is absent, then only non-virtual users are returned.
        The search can be performed using multiple criteria. If search criteria is specified, only the users matching all of the specified search criteria are included in the response. If no search criteria is specified, all results are returned.

name: GroupUserLanguageModifyRequest
documentation:
Request to modify language of the users within a group.
        If neither applyToUsers nor applyToServiceInstances is specified in the request, language is not changed for any user in the group.
        If applyToUsers is specified, regular users within the group have the language modified.
        If applyToServiceInstances is specified, the service instance users within the group have the language modified.

        The response is either SuccessResponse or ErrorResponse.

name: GroupVisualDeviceManagementGetDeviceInfoRequest
documentation:
Get the information for a specified device supporting visual device management.
        The response is either a GroupVisualDeviceManagementGetDeviceInfoResponse or ErrorResponse.

name: GroupXsiPolicyProfileAssignListRequest
documentation:
Assign a group level Xsi policy profile and a list of user Xsi policy profiles
        to a group.
        The response is either a SuccessResponse or an ErrorResponse.

name: GroupXsiPolicyProfileGetAssignedListRequest
documentation:
Get a list of Xsi policy profile assigned.
        The response is either a GroupXsiPolicyProfileGetAssignedListResponse
        or an ErrorResponse.

name: GroupXsiPolicyProfileGetAssignedUserListRequest
documentation:
Get a list of user within a group that have a given
        user Xsi policy profile assigned.
        The response is either a GroupXsiPolicyProfileGetAssignedUserListResponse
        or an ErrorResponse.

name: GroupXsiPolicyProfileModifyDefaultRequest
documentation:
Modifies the default Xsi policy profile for a group.
        It can only modify the user level default Xsi policy profile.
        The response is either a SuccessResponse or an ErrorResponse.

name: GroupXsiPolicyProfileUnassignListRequest
documentation:
Unassign a list of Xsi policy profile.
        Only user level Xsi policy profile can be unassigned.
        The response is either a SuccessResponse or an ErrorResponse.
